response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, I propose an offer that aims to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my earnings. I am offering the product to you at a price of $950,000. This price not only reflects the product's high value but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for me. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
